Name: SearchBeamer
Notes: A stationary robotic enemy that shoots lasers to attack the player. It won't be able to shoot any lasers if the player stands on its head.

Obj_arg0.Name: Rotation Speed
Obj_arg0.Description: The rate at which it rotates. Default is 8.

Obj_arg1.Name: Attacking Range
Obj_arg1.Description: The active range in which it will attack the player. Default is 1000.

SW_A.Description: If used, it will attack only if this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

Player2Targetable.Description: Can be targeted and frozen by player 2.

YoshiTargetable.Description: Can be targeted and licked by Yoshi.
